
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53004384">
想要学习自媒体的可以看下，感觉很全面，很适合入门<br>
<br>
从自媒体基础的选题，和一些完播技巧，到剪映的实操，从基础，转场，到关键帧，蒙版等<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_z7e57" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://photo.459122.xyz/i/17a11a5eafdc25a5c16acdf177804aeb.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://photo.459122.xyz/i/17a11a5eafdc25a5c16acdf177804aeb.png"><img id="aimg_aT537" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://photo.459122.xyz/i/60754de61229a4e5b74db07167741fe4.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://photo.459122.xyz/i/60754de61229a4e5b74db07167741fe4.png"><img id="aimg_dFSIF" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://photo.459122.xyz/i/d9d0303373876f41b70ce15f34397e56.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://photo.459122.xyz/i/d9d0303373876f41b70ce15f34397e56.png"><br>
<br>
<br>
基础介绍：<br>
自媒体的技巧，剪映软件的核心功能、剪辑技巧、特效与滤镜应用、音效处理、节奏把控及内容优化策略等内容，帮助学员系统性掌握如何制作引人注目的短视频，提升作品的传播力与吸引力，实现短视频的爆款效果。通过实操练习，增强学员的剪辑技能与创作信心。<br>
<br>
<br>
